main_text:
Stuff as Distinct From Things
3. Stuff as Distinct From Things

The first three approaches to the referents of nominal concrete mass
expressions in the foregoing section are all relatively conservative.
All three are compatible with Thing Theory as described in
 1.1.
 In this section we will examine views which posit non-thing-like
stuff in addition to things
 (3.1),
 or eliminate things altogether
 (3.2),
 and so are not compatible with Thing Theory.
hierarchy_title: The Metaphysics of Mass Expressions || Stuff as Distinct From Things
